General.Name: Goldflare Exploration Inc
General.Description: Goldflare Exploration Inc. acquires, explores for, and develops gold properties. The company holds interest in the Aiguebelle-Goldfields, Syenite Condor, Ranger, Windfall, Duplessis-Agar, Duplessis-Mountain, and Destorbelle properties in Canada. The company was formerly known as Typhoon Exploration Inc. and changed its name to Goldflare Exploration Inc. in September 2021. Goldflare Exploration Inc. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Piedmont, Canada.
General.Address: 458 boulevard des Laurentides, Piedmont, NS, Canada, J0R 1K0
